FuncDef: This command specifies the pre-shared key used to enable MACsec using static connectivity association key (CAK) security mode. This command also specifies the encryption algorithm used for encrypting the SAK.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the index of this pre-shared-key. Values-1, 2.
Specifies the type of encryption. Values-aes-128-cmac, aes-256-cmac.
